summary: This is an automated out-of-office email reply from a U.S. Attorney's Office employee, indicating they will be traveling for work until September 20, 2019, and providing instructions for urgent assistance. The subject line references 'UMR - Epstein/DB'.

events.title: Out-of-office notification

keyFacts: The document is an automated out-of-office email reply dated September 19, 2019.
The email subject references 'UMR - Epstein/DB', suggesting it relates to the Epstein case, possibly under the designation 'UMR'.
The sender/recipient is associated with the U.S. Attorney's Office (USANYS), indicating official legal or investigative involvement.
The email indicates the individual was on work travel, potentially for case-related purposes.
The file identifier 'EFTA00013464' is used as a placeholder but does not represent a named individual.
